document.full_text: a hacker breached the twitter account of state house speaker william g. batchelder and sent out posts that made it appear as though the republican was supporting liberal causes.
document.title: midwest: ohio: not my tweet. i don't tweet, do i?
lines_and_colors: a hacker breached the twitter account of state house speaker william g. batchelder and sent out posts that made it appear as though the republican was supporting liberal causes.
